::: {.Exercise data-latex=""}

Calculez la concentration des solutions suivantes :

a. $\ce{HCl}$ de pH = 4.
\vspace{\stretch{1}}
b. $\ce{KOH}$ de pH = 12.
\vspace{\stretch{1}}

:::

::: {.Answer data-latex=""}

a. $|\ce{HCl}| = 10^{-4}\ [M]$
\vspace{1em}
b. $|\ce{H3O+}| = 10^{-12}\ [M]$ et $|\ce{KOH}| = |\ce{OH-}| = 10^{-2}\ [M]$

:::
